summary: The story of the NHL's early years, focusing on the battle between the players, led by Hall of Famer Ted Lindsay, and the owners, over issues of benefits, pensions and the like.
cast: Aidan Devine|Kevin Conway|Robin Gammell|Carl Marotte|Richard Donat|Dan Lett|Michael J. Reynolds|Roman Podhora|Billy Van|R.H. Thomson|Al Waxman|Luigi Antonacci|Chris Bensen|Robert Benson|Richard Blackburn|Alex Carter|Clive Cholerton|Lisa Ciara|Joseph Ciccoritti|Mary Ann Coles|Michael Copeman|Neil Dainard|Vanessa J. title: Net Worth
